title: AWO Initiation Artifact
description: Declares the existence of an intentional unit of work. Captures intent, high-level scope boundary, initiating actors, and AI assistance disclosure without asserting legitimacy, correctness, or authority.

awo_version.description: AWO version this initiation artifact conforms to.

artifact_id.description: Globally unique identifier for this initiation artifact.

actors.description: Actors initiating the unit of work.

ai_assisted.description: TRUE indicates AI assistance was used in forming intent.

intent.description: Free-text declaration of the intended work or inquiry.

scope_boundary.description: High-level declaration of what this work is and is not intended to cover.

notes.description: Optional contextual notes or constraints declared at initiation time.
